meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Reverchon Park - Dedication Plaque
agenda_items.description: Authorize the placement of a dedication plaque at the Reverchon Park Ballfield, located at 3505 Maple Avenue.

agenda_items.title: Reverchon Park - Interpretive Signage
agenda_items.description: Authorize the placement of interpretive signage at the Reverchon Ballpark, located at 3505 Maple Avenue.

agenda_items.title: Trinity Strand Hi Line Bridge - Engineering Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an engineering services contract with Raba Kistner, Inc. to provide material testing and construction observation services for the Trinity Strand Hi-Line Span Bridge and Trail Project located at 1998 Hi-Line Drive.

agenda_items.title: Lake Highlands - Construction Services Contract Increase
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with RoeschCo Construction, LLC for the construction of the Lake Highlands Trail Phase 2A/2B, Northern Extension.

agenda_items.title: College Park Renaming
agenda_items.description: Authorize the official name change of College Park to 'Fahim J. Minkah Community Park' at Bonnie View Road and Highland Woods Drive.

agenda_items.title: Montfort Drive - Land Acquisition
agenda_items.description: Authorize the land acquisition and assumption of existing leases from Montfort Valley View Shopping Center, LLC, of approximately 79,933 square feet of improved land for the future International Commons.

financial_items.description: Engineering services contract for Trinity Strand Hi-Line Span Bridge and Trail Project
Increase in construction services contract for Lake Highlands Trail Phase 2A/2B
